attributes.action: pensioners should not pay tax if proven gross income is less than £20000 a year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all retired pensioners should not pay tax if thier gross income is less than £20000 a year, this would enable pensioners who have not saved and need to work after retirement age to make ends meet and release more jobs for the younger generation, all pensioners claiming this tax relief should make declaration to the fact that they have an income less than £20000 and be available to have thier information checked to ensure this is correct
